content.text: The mower shall automatically stop blades when lifted or tilted.
The mower shall be constructed with impact-resistant polymer body with aluminum reinforcement.
ï‚· Ergonomics shall follow ISO 9241-210:2019 principles for human-centered design.
Touch interfaces shall comply with ISO 9241-960:2017 for touch and haptic interactions.
The mower shall support multi-zone management with varied cutting requirements.
API integrations shall follow OpenAPI Specification 3.1 standards.
ï‚· API integrations shall follow OpenAPI Specification 3.1 standards.
ï‚· Smart home integration shall be compatible with ISO/IEC 14543-3 home electronic systems standards.
The manufacturer shall update product materials as necessary to comply with REACH updates.
ï‚· The product shall comply with IEC 62474 for material declaration in products.
Radio equipment shall comply with RED Directive 2014/53/EU for radio equipment compliance.
The mower shall be designed with modular components to facilitate disassembly and recycling.
The battery system shall be removable without specialized tools for separate recycling.
Design for disassembly shall comply with ISO 14001:2015 environmental management standards.
The mower shall be subjected to a 1000-hour durability test in simulated challenging conditions.
The mower shall be drop tested from a height of 15cm onto concrete without damage to critical safety systems.
ï‚· All electrical components shall be tested for water ingress protection according to IP65 standards.
Drop testing shall follow IEC 60068-2-31 procedures for rough handling shocks.
ï‚· All wireless communications shall use minimum TLS 1.3 encryption.
ï‚· Safety systems shall meet IEC 62061 safety standards for machinery control systems.
The mower shall not have exposed sharp edges that could cause injury.
All paints, coatings, and finishes shall be REACH-compliant and free from restricted phthalates and heavy metals.
ï‚· All paints, coatings, and finishes shall be REACH-compliant and free from restricted phthalates and heavy metals.
ï‚· Weather resistance shall be tested according to IEC 60529:1989 for IP code ratings.

content.text: ï‚· All electronic displays and interface components shall comply with REACH regulations regarding flame retardants and hazardous substances.
Mobile application shall follow WCAG 2.1 accessibility guidelines.
ï‚· The manufacturer shall update product materials as necessary to comply with REACH updates.
Battery components shall comply with the EU Battery Directive (2006/66/EC) in addition to REACH requirements.
ï‚· The battery system shall be removable without specialized tools for separate recycling.
ï‚· All circuit boards shall be easily removable for proper e-waste processing.
ï‚· The product shall achieve a minimum recycling rate of 85% by weight.
The packaging shall be made from minimum 90% recycled or renewable materials.
ï‚· Battery recycling shall comply with IEC 63333 standards for lithium-ion battery recycling.
ï‚· The lift sensor shall be verified to stop blade rotation within 0.2 seconds when the mower is tilted more than 35Â° in any direction.
ï‚· The object recognition system shall be verified with a minimum of 1000 test scenarios including humans, animals, and common yard obstacles.
ï‚· The mower shall pass all safety tests under varying light and weather conditions (excluding severe weather).
EMC testing shall follow IEC 61000-4 series standards for electromagnetic compatibility.
The system shall perform automatic security updates at least quarterly.
ï‚· The system shall perform automatic security updates at least quarterly.
The software shall undergo penetration testing by a certified third party before each major release.
ï‚· User data shall be encrypted both in transit and at rest using AES-256 encryption.
ï‚· Network security shall comply with ISO/IEC 27033 for IT network security.
ï‚· The mower shall incorporate GPS tracking, alarm system, and authentication requirements.
The system shall feature enhanced detection for children and pets with enlarged safety perimeter.
Object detection systems shall meet IEC 62998 for safety-related sensors used for protection of persons.
All polymers and plastics used in construction shall comply with REACH regulations for SVHCs (Substances of Very High Concern).

content.text: All electronic displays and interface components shall comply with REACH regulations regarding flame retardants and hazardous substances.
ï‚· Mobile application shall follow WCAG 2.1 accessibility guidelines.
The system shall provide API for integration with smart home systems.
The mower shall not store personally identifiable information without encryption.
ï‚· The product shall comply with REACH Annex XVII restrictions on the use of certain hazardous substances.
The manufacturer shall provide a Declaration of Conformity certifying REACH compliance.
ï‚· All electronic components shall comply with RoHS 3 Directive (2015/863/EU) in addition to REACH requirements.
The product shall include clear markings identifying material types for all plastic components weighing more than 25g.
The manufacturer shall provide a comprehensive end-of-life disassembly guide to authorized recycling facilities.
The manufacturer shall publish annual recycling metrics for transparency.
ï‚· Design for disassembly shall comply with ISO 14001:2015 environmental management standards.
ï‚· The mower shall be drop tested from a height of 15cm onto concrete without damage to critical safety systems.
Safety testing shall comply with IEC 61508-2:2010 for functional safety validation.
ï‚· Water and dust ingress testing shall comply with IEC 60529 standards for IP testing.
ï‚· Software safety testing shall comply with IEC 61508-3:2010 for software safety requirements.
ï‚· The mower shall not restart automatically after emergency stop activation.
ï‚· The mower shall not operate during severe weather conditions.
ï‚· All safety components shall comply with both CE safety standards and REACH chemical regulations.
The emergency stop system shall comply with ISO 13850:2015 for emergency stop principles.
ï‚· The emergency stop system shall comply with ISO 13850:2015 for emergency stop principles.
The system shall meet or exceed IP65 rating for water and dust resistance.
ï‚· The system shall meet or exceed IP65 rating for water and dust resistance.
Noise level shall not exceed 65 dB measured at 3 feet.

ï‚· The system shall provide a mobile app with complete control capabilities including:
o Real-time monitoring and control
o Scheduling and zone management
o Performance statistics and battery status
o Maintenance alerts and diagnostics
The interface shall not allow critical safety features to be disabled.
The product shall comply with REACH Annex XVII restrictions on the use of certain hazardous substances.
All electronic components shall comply with RoHS 3 Directive (2015/863/EU) in addition to REACH requirements.
Electromagnetic compatibility shall meet IEC 61000 series standards for EMC.
The circuit boards shall not contain brominated flame retardants to facilitate safer recycling.
Material marking shall follow ISO 11469:2016 for generic identification of plastics.
The emergency stop function shall be tested to ensure blade stoppage within 0.5 seconds of activation.
ï‚· The blade containment system shall be tested by introducing foreign objects to verify debris is not ejected at unsafe velocities.
ï‚· Safety testing shall comply with IEC 61508-2:2010 for functional safety validation.
ï‚· The software shall undergo penetration testing by a certified third party before each major release.
The mower shall include physical and remote emergency stop capabilities.
ï‚· The system shall automatically detect and avoid people, animals, and obstacles.
ï‚· The mower shall be constructed with impact-resistant polymer body with aluminum reinforcement.
Weather resistance shall be tested according to IEC 60529:1989 for IP code ratings.
ï‚· Acoustics testing shall follow ISO 3744:2010 for noise emission measurement.
Ergonomics shall follow ISO 9241-210:2019 principles for human-centered design.

Interface symbols shall conform to IEC 60417 for graphical symbols on equipment.
ï‚· The mower shall include integrated mulching capability with collection bag option.
Smart home integration shall be compatible with ISO/IEC 14543-3 home electronic systems standards.
The manufacturer shall maintain a complete inventory of all substances used in the product exceeding 0.1% by weight.

The product shall not contain any Substances of Very High Concern (SVHCs) as defined in the most current REACH Candidate List.
